statements: SELECT * FROM patent_applications WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM patent_applications WHERE product_name = 'Software' ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, product_name FROM patent_applications WHERE applicant_name = 'John Doe' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM patent_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT DISTINCT status FROM patent_applications ORDER BY status ASC;
SELECT * FROM patent_applications WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT application_id, product_name, applicant_name FROM patent_applications WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_applications FROM patent_applications WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT product_name, applicant_name, status FROM patent_applications WHERE status IN ('Pending', 'In Progress') ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_applications WHERE applicant_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY product_name ASC, application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_applications;
SELECT id, product_name, application_status FROM patent_applications WHERE application_status = 'pending';
SELECT applicant_name FROM patent_applications WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM application_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, update_text FROM application_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patent_applications ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT applicant_name, application_status FROM patent_applications WHERE application_status = 'Pending'
SELECT update_date, update_text FROM application_updates WHERE application_id = 1 ORDER BY update_date ASC
SELECT id, applicant_name FROM patent_applications WHERE applicant_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT application_id, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM application_updates GROUP BY application_id HAVING total_updates > 5
SELECT * FROM pharmaceutical_products;
SELECT product_name, status FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_applications WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT product_id, applicant_name FROM patent_applications ORDER BY applicant_name;
SELECT application_id, update_date, update_content FROM updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;

SELECT product_name, status FROM pharmaceutical_products WHERE status='Approved';
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM pharmaceutical_products ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM patent_applications WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT updates.update_id, updates.update_date, patent_applications.applicant_name FROM updates INNER JOIN patent_applications ON updates.application_id = patent_applications.application_id;
SELECT * FROM patent_applications;
SELECT product_name, applicant_name FROM patent_applications WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT applicant_name, location, contact_number FROM applicant_details ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, dosage_form FROM product_details WHERE indication='Pain Relief';
SELECT application_id, update_date, update_description FROM application_updates WHERE application_id=1001;

SELECT product_name, applicant_name FROM patent_applications WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT applicant_name, application_date FROM patent_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM applicant_details WHERE location='California';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, dosage_form FROM product_details WHERE indication='Pain Relief' ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM patent_applications;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name FROM patent_applications WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, address FROM applicants WHERE contact_email='example@example.com';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE role='Manager' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;

SELECT product_name, applicant_name FROM patent_applications WHERE status='pending';
SELECT * FROM patent_updates WHERE update_text LIKE '%important%';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM products ORDER BY approval_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT applicant_name, contact_email FROM applicants WHERE address LIKE '%California%';
